company.name: Issac MasterCraft Interiors
company.tagline: Building Dreams with 15 Years of Excellence
company.description: Premium interior & carpentry services delivering exceptional craftsmanship for residential and commercial projects. From custom furniture to complete home renovations, we bring your vision to life with precision, passion, and unmatched attention to detail.

hero.title: Expert Interior & Carpentry Services
hero.subtitle: Transforming Spaces with Precision & Passion
hero.description: With over 15 years of experience and hundreds of satisfied clients, we deliver exceptional interior & carpentry solutions that stand the test of time.

services.name: Custom Furniture
services.description: Handcrafted furniture tailored to your space and style preferences with premium materials.

services.name: Home Renovation
services.description: Complete home makeovers with modern design, functionality, and attention to detail.

services.name: Commercial Projects
services.description: Professional interior & carpentry for offices, restaurants, retail spaces, and commercial establishments.

services.name: Repair & Maintenance
services.description: Quick, reliable repair services for all your interior & carpentry needs with same-day service available.

projects.title: Luxury Villa Interior
projects.description: Complete interior & carpentry for a 4BHK luxury villa including custom wardrobes, modular kitchen, entertainment units, and study areas. This project showcased our expertise in high-end residential work with premium materials and sophisticated design.
projects.testimonial: Exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail. The team transformed our home beyond our expectations.

projects.title: Modern Office Setup
projects.description: Contemporary office interiors for a tech startup including ergonomic workstations, collaborative meeting rooms, and an impressive reception area that reflects the company's innovative culture.
projects.testimonial: Professional service from start to finish. They understood our needs perfectly and delivered a modern workspace.

projects.title: Heritage Home Restoration
projects.description: Careful restoration of traditional wooden elements while adding modern functionality to a century-old heritage home. This project required specialized techniques to preserve historical integrity while improving livability.
projects.testimonial: They preserved the soul of our heritage home while making it functional for modern living.

projects.title: Boutique Restaurant Design
projects.description: Elegant restaurant interiors featuring custom dining furniture, an impressive bar counter, and decorative elements that create an inviting ambiance for fine dining experiences.
projects.testimonial: The ambiance they created with their woodwork has significantly enhanced our customers' dining experience.

testimonials.name: Mohan Kumar
testimonials.comment: Outstanding work! Issac and his team transformed our home with beautiful custom furniture. The attention to detail is remarkable, and they completed everything on time. The quality of craftsmanship exceeded our expectations, and the team was professional throughout the project.

testimonials.name: Srujana Macharla
testimonials.comment: Professional service from start to finish. They understood our office requirements perfectly and delivered a modern, functional workspace that our employees love. The project was completed within budget and timeline, which is rare in this industry.

testimonials.name: Anita Reddy
testimonials.comment: I've worked with many carpenters, but MasterCraft stands out for their craftsmanship and reliability. They bring designs to life with precision and creativity. Their ability to interpret and execute complex designs is exceptional.

testimonials.name: Suresh Patel
testimonials.comment: The custom furniture they created for our restaurant has become a talking point among our customers. The quality is exceptional, and their understanding of commercial requirements is impressive. Highly recommended for commercial projects.

process.title: Initial Consultation
process.description: Free on-site consultation to understand your vision, requirements, and budget. We assess the space and discuss design preferences.

process.title: Design & Planning
process.description: Detailed design creation with 3D visualization, material selection, and comprehensive project planning.

process.title: Quote & Agreement
process.description: Transparent pricing with detailed breakdown, timeline, and terms. No hidden costs, everything clearly defined.

process.title: Material Procurement
process.description: Sourcing premium quality materials from trusted suppliers, ensuring authenticity and durability.

process.title: Manufacturing
process.description: Precision crafting using modern techniques and traditional skills, with regular quality checks throughout.

process.title: Installation
process.description: Professional installation with minimal disruption to your routine, ensuring perfect fit and finish.

process.title: Quality Check & Handover
process.description: Final inspection, client walkthrough, and handover with maintenance instructions.

whyChooseUs.title: 15+ Years Experience
whyChooseUs.description: Extensive experience across residential and commercial projects with proven track record of excellence.
benefits: Expertise in all interior & carpentry types

whyChooseUs.title: Premium Quality Materials
whyChooseUs.description: We source only the finest materials and use superior craftsmanship techniques for lasting results.

whyChooseUs.title: On-Time Delivery
whyChooseUs.description: Committed to meeting deadlines without compromising quality, with transparent project tracking.

whyChooseUs.title: End-to-End Service
whyChooseUs.description: Complete service from design consultation to final installation and ongoing maintenance support.
